page.title: 05THE COUNTRYSIDE - CALNE
page.content: I like living in Calne, because it is a nice place . You can go on long walks in the countryside. I like walking in the woods and along the river and up the sandpits because I like seeing the birds and animals.On Saturdays my Dad and I go for long walks to Compton Bassett. We went up the lane and saw a greenfinch.We went through some fields and saw some long-tailed tits and wrens.We went along the lane and through more fields until we saw a pit with lots of rabbit holes and rabbits were everywhere. We heard a bird but did not know what it was until it came out, it was a wood warbler. We found a pond with primroses around it and I let my frogs go there.We saw some swallows and a moorhen fly across the pool.We had to crawl under some barbed wire and a partridge flew out of the hedge.
